block.p: People Eric R. Mason is joining the Carlyle Group as a managing director in the leveraged finance group. He will be based in Hong Kong. He was a managing director and co-head of JPMorgan Chase's syndicated and leveraged finance business in the Asia Pacific region.
Morgan Stanley has appointed Blair Pickerell, formerly of HSBC, as a managing director and head of Morgan Stanley Investment Management for Asia.

People Eric R. Mason is joining the Carlyle Group as a managing director in the leveraged finance group. He will be based in Hong Kong. He was a managing director and co-head of JPMorgan Chase's syndicated and leveraged finance business in the Asia Pacific region.
Morgan Stanley has appointed Blair Pickerell, formerly of HSBC, as a managing director and head of Morgan Stanley Investment Management for Asia.

HSBC Securities (USA) has hired Alexander Shepard and Carmine Gizze. Mr. Shepard, formerly of ABN Amro, joins as a managing director and head of equity trading and sales trading for the Americas. Mr. Gizze, formerly of ICAP Securities, joins the international equity trading team as a senior vice president.
Charles Rule, formerly of Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver and Jacobson, is joining Cadwalader, Wickersham & Taft as head of the firm's antitrust practice.
Alan J. Stone has joined Milbank, Tweed, Hadley & McCloy as a partner in the New York office. Mr. Stone was a partner in the Wilmington, Del., office of Morris, Nichols, Arsht & Tunnell.

John White has joined the structured finance practice of Jones Day as a counsel in its Atlanta office. Bruce Luna has joined as an associate. Both were with Cadwalader Wickersham & Taft. Carey Gabay, formerly of Schulte Roth & Zabel, and Katherine Bushueff, formerly of Cadwalader, are joining the structured finance practice of Jones Day in New York as associates.
Barry McCarty, a former senior counsel with the Securities and Exchange Commission, has joined Schulte Roth & Zabel as special counsel in the business transactions group.
Ken Breen, formerly of Fulbright & Jaworski and a former assistant United States attorney in Brooklyn, joins Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker as a partner.
Andrew Silver has joined Houlihan Lokey as a managing director in the basic industrials group.
Ralph Miles, formerly of McCarter & English, has joined Venable as a partner to direct the firm's real estate work in New York.
